extDescription.message: Reload All tabs using keyboard shortcut (alt + shift + r), context menu or browser action button.

optionsSaveNote.message: Make sure you save the settings after you're done editing!

visitExtensionPage.description: Link text to visit extension page

followOnTwitter.message: You should follow me on Twitter

forFeatureRequests.message: for feature requests or reporting bugs!

showButtonInstruction.description: Instructions for showing the browser action button

buttonDefaultActionLabel.message: When clicking the browser action, reload:

contextMenuMultipleNote.message: When you have multiple checkboxes checked, it will place all context menus under one parent "Reload All Tabs" menu.
contextMenuMultipleNote.description: Note about multiple context menu items

contextMenuSingleNote.message: When you have just a single context menu selected, there will be no parent.
contextMenuSingleNote.description: Note about single context menu item

reloadWindowLabel.message: Reload all tabs in current window

clipboardCopySuccess.message: Copied the following link '$1' to clipboard. You can change its defaults there. Due to Chrome security, you need to visit it manually.
